comment.shortText:
listens to commands issued to `commandPort` on this machine.
Format:
`http://x.x.x.x/?cmd=<cmd param>&sender=<sender>`
arms all armable devices. If `away` is specified, it also sets the device's audible alarm repsonses
arms all armable devices. If `away` is specified, it also sets the device's audible alarm repsonses

comment.shortText:
request to snap a picture. If a device name is specified, a snapshot from that device will be requested.
If no name is specified, a snapshot from each available camera will be requested.
comment.returns: promise to provide the file name if successful

comment.shortText:
Home Alarm Manager - Main entry point
Call as:
```
node run
```
returns a promise to arm or disarm the device.
comment.returns: Promise a promise that resolves to True (status: armed) or False (status: disarmed).

comment.text: `true` will arm, `false` will disarm the device.

comment.shortText: promises to check whether the device is armed or not.
comment.returns: Promise a promise that resolves to True (status: armed) or False (status: disarmed).

comment.shortText: gets the device's ftp confguration and calls `cb`.
promised to send `cmd` to the foscam camera specified in `options`

sets the global audible flag. If the flag is set to true,
devices will sound an audible alarm after the next time they are armed.
comment.returns: Promise a promise that always resolves to True.

comment.shortText: promises to set the device's ftp confguration.
comment.returns: Promise a promise that resolves to undefined.

comment.shortText: sets the global snapshot directory.
comment.returns: Promise a promise that always resolves to True.
